info.author: Thomas Thurman
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
Yarrow is a Web front-end for the message board transfer protocol RGTP, used on
the Cambridge GROGGS system. RGTP is notable for cryptographic authentication of
posters, and item-based rather than thread-based discussion.
info.keywords: rgtp bulletin board bbs discussion groggs
info.name: Yarrow
info.summary: Browse RGTP-based bulletin boards over HTTP
info.html_description: Yarrow is a Web front-end for the message board transfer protocol RGTP, used on the Cambridge GROGGS system. RGTP is notable for cryptographic authentication of posters, and item-based rather than thread-based discussion.
